Sentencas: In this study, three different nickel based meshes are investigated as an anode side current collector and flow-field for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) to reduce the fabrication cost.
Titulo: Effects of mesh and interconnector design on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The same meshes are also tested on the conventional interconnectors with machined gas channels for comparison.
Titulo: Effects of mesh and interconnector design on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Eight different short stacks are installed for this purpose.
Titulo: Effects of mesh and interconnector design on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The characterizations of the short stacks are achieved via performance tests together with electrochemical impedance spectroscopy analyses.
Titulo: Effects of mesh and interconnector design on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: The experimental results reveal that the woven nickel mesh provides the required current collection and can act as an anode flow-field.
Titulo: Effects of mesh and interconnector design on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: It is also found that the spot welding of this mesh significantly improves the cell performance due to the enhanced contact between the mesh and the interconnector.
Titulo: Effects of mesh and interconnector design on solid oxide fuel cell performance

Sentencas: Therefore, the spot welded nickel mesh can be directly employed on the anode interconnector as an effective anode current collector and flow-field without machining gas channels to reduce the SOFC cell/stack fabrication cost.
Titulo: Effects of mesh and interconnector design on solid oxide fuel cell performance
